snippet: The movie has already been panned by Mr. Spector’s wife and the family of Lana Clarkson, an actress for whose 2003 murder he is currently serving 19 years to life in prison.
abstract: The movie has already been panned by Mr. Spector’s wife and the family of Lana Clarkson, an actress for whose 2003 murder he is currently serving 19 years to life in prison.

headline.main: Harsh Words for HBO's Phil Spector Biopic
headline.print_headline: Criticism for HBO Film About Phil Spector
